projects.title: Pronunciation Coach Application
projects.subtitle: Full-Stack Cross-Platform App
projects.shortDescription: Cross-platform pronunciation training app built with Flutter and Dart using Scrum and DevOps practices.
projects.description: Led an 8-member team to deliver a full-stack cross-platform app using Flutter and Dart. Implemented Scrum sprints, Git-based workflows, and DevOps pipelines to deploy 100% of planned features on schedule. Managed a Supabase backend with PostgreSQL, integrated secure authentication, and developed a responsive, user-friendly front end for pronunciation training.

projects.title: LIDRON Research Project
projects.subtitle: LiDAR-Based Autonomous Landing
projects.shortDescription: Developed LiDAR-based landing algorithms for autonomous drone navigation using ROS and embedded systems.
projects.description: Designed and implemented LiDAR-based autonomous landing algorithms in ROS and Python for real-time perception, mapping, and navigation on a Raspberry Pi-powered drone. Integrated computer vision, sensor fusion, and embedded control systems to enable autonomous decision-making and flight stability as part of an interdisciplinary robotics research team.

projects.title: LaLiga Match Predictor
projects.subtitle: Machine Learning System
projects.shortDescription: Machine learning web app predicting LaLiga match outcomes with Random Forests and data-driven analysis.
projects.description: Developed a full-stack ML system for predicting LaLiga match outcomes using Python and scikit-learn. Implemented data cleaning and feature engineering pipelines with pandas, improving prediction accuracy from 33% to 60% using a Random Forest model. Built and deployed the frontend in React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS, integrated with a PostgreSQL database backend.

projects.title: Personal Home Server
projects.subtitle: Dockerized Media System
projects.shortDescription: Linux-based home server for media services managed through Docker and Bash automation.
projects.description: Built and maintain a personal home server running on a headless Linux distribution. Deployed media and utility services using Docker containers and managed automation and maintenance through Bash scripting. Focused on reliability, efficient resource usage, and long-term scalability.

projects.title: SeFueLaLuz
projects.subtitle: Unity Game Jam Project
projects.shortDescription: Solo-developed Unity game featuring AI-driven enemies and gameplay systems built entirely in C#.
projects.description: Solely designed and developed a complete Unity game during a one-week game jam. Implemented core gameplay systems, enemy chasing AI, and player interaction mechanics entirely in C#. Focused on tight iteration cycles and efficient code structure under time constraints.

responsibilities: Conducted mathematical research in coding theory and combinatorics.
Applied discrete mathematics to theoretical and computational problems.
Designed algorithms and analyzed data structures for graph theory and error-correcting codes.
Developed LiDAR-based autonomous landing algorithms for drones.
Implemented ROS-based navigation and perception systems.
Integrated embedded hardware and computer vision pipelines.
